channel.title: [pi] help! no tuts on this topic![pi]

item.title: [pi] help! no tuts on this topic![pi]
item.dc:creator: @Revil Revil
item.description:
@Revil wrote:

I’ve added this command to my source for changing appearance other than talking to the make-over mage:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("char")) { c.getPA().showInterface(3559); c.canChangeAppearance = true; }
Hope it works for you.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] help! no tuts on this topic![pi]

item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

thankyou for the npcreset command :]
and what must i do to canchangeappearance command to make it only appear the once
when the account first logs.?

item.title: [pi] help! no tuts on this topic![pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

I’d look for how your server handles starter items and adding it there

Also

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset")){ for (int i = 0; i < Server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) { if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].isDead = true; Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } }

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] help! no tuts on this topic![pi]

item.title: [pi] help! no tuts on this topic![pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hey, recently iv added this code:
getPA().showInterface(3559);
canChangeAppearance = true;

this is for ::char/whatever you wish call it to appear when you log in.
i wont to know how make the ::char/change appearance edit to come up for new accounts.
e.g. to make it so an account which has already been logged in once will not get the ::char/ change appearance edit come up.
(only for accounts which it is it’s first time loging in.

and my other question is anyone has an ::npcreset command for pi? iv looked everywhere and gogled for hours and still cant find one so if you have it on your source could you pls give me your code?
thank you guys for looking at my questions

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] help! no tuts on this topic![pi]
